articles.title: Songdowon Bathing Resort Crowded with People
articles.content:
Songdowon Bathing Resort Crowded with People
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Members of south Korean organizations including the Memorial Commission for Martyr An Jung Gun held a press conference at the plaza of Kwanghwamun, Seoul on Thursday in protest against the puppet authorities for trying to cover up the crimes by pro-Japanese elements.
					 They recalled that the Cultural Property Agency is mulling registering clothes and relics of those who earned an ill fame for their sycophancy toward Japan as sort of artifacts. Among them is a man who received even the title of baron in return for cooperating with the Japanese imperialists while serving the Imperial Japanese Army as an officer and took the lead in executing activists for independence during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea, they said.
					
					 The behavior of the authorities will result in concealing the crimes committed by the pro-Japanese elements as it is an insult to the activists for anti-Japanese independence, they warned.
					
					 They cannot pardon the act of eulogizing pro-Japanese elements, they stressed.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Opt for Liquidating Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Opt for Liquidating Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities should stop the moves for revising the constitution and lurching to the right but opt for making reparation, apology and compensation for the past crimes, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 After the 23rd election of the House of Councilors of Japan its politicians have become busy intensifying the Japan-U.S. alliance and moving to revise the constitution, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese right-wing reactionaries, keen on removing a hurdle in realizing their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere", chose the revision of the constitution, Article 9 to be specific, as a solution.
					
					 This is aimed to turn the "Self-Defense Forces" into a "defense army" for legitimate overseas aggression and carry into practice the old dream they failed to realize in the past.
					
					 The moves of the Japanese reactionaries to revise the constitution are a prelude to a war of aggression. Their moves are a challenge to the aspiration of mankind for peace and will precipitate their self-destruction.
					
					 The Japanese and international community are closely following Japan's moves for militarizing the country and veering to the right.
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries are denying the past history and running headlong into militarization, not reading other's face.
					
					 If Japan does not properly face up to the past history and honestly repent of it, it will never get out of the dark shadow of history nor keep its existence, far from winning trust from other countries.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Imposing Heavy Tax on People
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Imposing Heavy Tax on People
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- South Korean trade unions accused the puppet regime of proposing the reform of tax system to increase tax upon the workers, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The Federation of Trade Unions in a statement on August 8 denounced the projected reform as very unfair, saying that it exempts enterprises of taxes and imposes heavier taxes on the workers.
					
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions said in a statement the income of workers is the lowest in the world, declaring that they would fight against all unreasonable acts of making the rich richer while driving the workers to the brink of livelihood.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Swiss Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Swiss Website
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on its website on August 4.
					 The work, made public on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It formulates the three principles of national reunification, 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks and ways to reunify the country based on them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il posted an article titled "Rare strategist" on its website on August 1 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The miraculous victory won by the DPRK in the fierce fight against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces was a brilliant victory of the outstanding commanding art of President Kim Il Sung, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. ignited a war of aggression against the DPRK on June 25, 1950 by instigating south Korea.
					
					 Pursuant to the original strategy of the President the Korean People's Army immediately frustrated the enemy's surprise invasion and went over to counterattack. It seized control of Seoul three days after the start of war and worked a miracle of liberating over 90 percent of the whole area of south Korea in a matter of a little over one month.
					
					 The President adorned brilliant pages of the history of modern war with his original war methods.
					
					 The victory in the battle for defending Height 1211 which was widely known was a fruition of the tunnel warfare.
					
					 The numerical and technical superiorities of the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world was shattered by the strategic and tactical superiorities of the Korean People's Army led by Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Italian Parliamentarian on his Impression of Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Italian Parliamentarian on His Impression of Visit to DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Antonio Lazi, a senator of Italy who led the delegation of the Parliament of Italy to the DPRK recently, praised the personality of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as a great men. He took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 In an interview with a reporter of the Il Centro on August 4 he said he attended the celebrations, adding:
					
					 I was deeply moved to visit Pyongyang for the first time.
					
					 This time I participated in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war and had the audience of the leader of the country. When I introduced I was an Italian, Marshal Kim Jong Un made a warm smile on his face.
					
					 He is a very simple and kind man. He loves all sports events including basketball.
					
					 Accusations of the DPRK by the Western media outlets are far from the fact.
					
					 The DPRK is a very stable country. Streets are beautiful and clean with lots of new ultra-high apartment houses.
					
					 Referring to the relations between Italy and the DPRK, the senator recommended all people to visit the DPRK. Italians should visit the DPRK first before commenting on it, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la Fabrica 11 de Mayo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la Fabrica 11 de Mayo
Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica 11 de Mayo.
					Recorrio el taller de montaje y otros puntos de la fabrica averiguando en detalles la eficiencia, la calidad y el empaque de telefono celular de marca "Arirang" que se produce en la fabrica. 
					
					Aprecio mucho la creatividad y el patriotismo de los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica que al acondicionar nuevamente el moderno proceso de produccion de telefonos celulares, asentaron la firme base para producirlos en grandes cantidades. 
					
					Evaluo tambien el desarrollo al estilo coreano del programa de aplicacion en el principio de garantizar el confort de los usuarios y la seguridad. 
					
					Al estudiar como funciona el telefono celular de marca "Arirang" por contacto digital, dijo que la pantalla debe ser sensible para asegurar las comodidades a los usuarios y agrego que los altos pixeles de la camara insertada en el telefono convendrian a los usuarios. 
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho al informarse de que se incrementa el numero de compradores de telefonos "Arirang" que entraron en venta hace unos dias. 
					
					Viendo la marca "Arirang", inscrita en el telefono, enfatizo que para dar al pueblo coreano el orgullo y dignidad nacionales deben fabricar muchos productos de marca coreana. 
					
					!Que buena es la fabricacion de telefonos celulares con la tecnologia nacional!, dijo y anadio que esto tiene importancia educativa para hacer al pueblo coreano tener apego a los productos nacionales. 
					
					Insistio en aumentar el volumen de produccion y mejorar la calidad para que el pueblo ame lo suyo y se eleve la demanda sobre mercancias de fabricacion coreana. 
					
					Por ultimo, presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica. 
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Ri Jae Il y Kim Pyong Ho.
